title: How to Appear Offline on Steam While You're Still Online

steps.title: Launch the Steam app.
steps.content: Launch the Steam app. Steam is available to download on Windows, Mac, and Linux. If you aren't already logged into your account, enter your username and password to do so now. You can change your password if needed. Use this method to appear "Invisible" to all users on Steam. This is different from "Offline", which logs you out of the Steam community completely.

steps.title: Click Friends.
steps.content: Click Friends . This is at the top-left corner of the Steam window, between View and Games . [1] X Research source On Mac, this will be in the menu bar. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Invisible.
steps.content: Click Invisible . You will now be invisible to your Steam friends and other users. [2] X Research source If you want to appear online again, click Friends â†’ Online or Away . Your Steam activity, such as the hours played on a specific game, will still show on your profile. You can hide this activity in your settings.

steps.title: Use the Friends List (optional).
steps.content: Use the Friends List (optional). If you have Steam running in the background of your computer, you can use your Friends List to quickly change your status. Do the following: Open your computer's system tray. Click the Steam icon. Click Friends . Click the arrow next to your username. Click Invisible .
